refsection.para: Deletion of a node (subTree) from a tree. If we have 3 nodes called 'Node1', 'Node2' and 'Node3' each one at position 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3. Deletion of node at position 1.2 ('Node2') will pull up the 'Node 3' to position 1.2.
